Orange County Fire-Rescue Reshaping Your Future
Hi
The public safety industry has changed dramatically within the past five years – budget limitations, increased demands and consolidations. Many Fire-Rescue agencies have been able to balance the ongoing pressures by reshaping the way they manage information to help them focus on what's important.
Leveraging advanced technology, South Metro Fire Rescue has been able to reduce their dispatch time to 31 seconds. In comparison, the national standard is 60 seconds. Do you think your 9-1-1 center needs to be reshaped?
We would like to share our clients' best practices with others at your agency. If you would like to send this to a colleague, please click here.
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
